A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie is not only enjoyable\, but impressively well done with a combination of new and classic Star Wars. I am happy they took the gamble on many decisions\, even if it was divisive for this movie\, will hopefully pay off in the future. Also\, there were phenomenal performances by Adam Driver and Mark Hamill. As a movie fan and a Star Wars fan\, I was very satisfied with the movie and I am excited for the future of this story.
